metadata.name: ADDICTED TO LOVE #1/12
metadata.description:
Tina Turner, a true rock 'n' roll queen,
Her voice and style, like none ever seen,
Born Anna Mae Bullock, in Tennessee,
Her life's journey, a wild symphony.

At eighteen, she met Ike Turner,
Together they rocked, a fiery burner,
"River Deep - Mountain High," a hit song,
Their love story, short-lived, but not gone.

Tina's solo career, a phoenix's rise,
Her voice, a soulful, powerful surprise,
"Private Dancer," "What's Love Got to Do with It,"
Grammys, platinum records, she had hit after hit.

Her live performances, electric and bold,
Her moves, a spectacle to behold,
A true icon, a legend of our time,
Tina Turner, forever a muse, sublime.
